mcq.statement: Mark the correct statement: M.P of halogen increase down the group, M.P of halogen decrease down the group, M.P of halogen first increase and then decrease down the group, None of these

options.a: M.P of halogen increase down the group
options.b: M.P of halogen decrease down the group
options.c: M.P of halogen first increase and then decrease down the group
